subject: Career
title: Answering 'What's Your Weakness?'
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Answering 'What's Your Weakness?'.

hook.text: 'I'm a perfectionist' is the most mocked interview answer for a reason. Nobody buys it.

buildup.text: The question tests self-awareness, not confession. Interviewers want honest reflection.

discovery.text: Name a real weakness, then describe the system you built to manage it.

twist.text: 'I used to struggle with delegation, so I started using weekly check-ins to let go with guardrails.'

climax.text: The weakness matters less than the fix. Growth mindset is the real answer.

punchline.text: Show you know yourself. Then show you're working on it.

quiz.question: What does the weakness question actually test?
